name: Saved Selections
description:
Save, restore, and combine your carefully-crafted selections.

How to use:

1. Make a selection (one or more elements)
2. Click "Save Selection" and give it a name (or not)
3. To restore your selection at any time, click it in the list. Hold SHIFT while clicking and your saved selection will be combined with whatever you have currently selected.

I hope you find it useful. Feedback appreciated!
